data.actual_result: The box around the override doesn't expand, making the text overlap existing overrides.
data.expected_result: The box seperating the overrides should expand, making space for the category with a long name.
data.short_description: Notification Overrides' text overlap, if category name is too long.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a new category with at least 20 characters. - Create a new text channel in that category. Length of name is not important. - Go to Notification Settings. - Scroll down to Notification Overrides. - Create an override for that text channel, that is in the category.
